column8: DIME TO PENNY SIZE HAIL FALLING IN SPAULDING. (ILX)
PUBLIC REPORT OF DIME TO PENNY SIZE HAIL. TIME IS ESTIMATED. (JAX)
HAIL GENERALLY 1.25 INCHES IN DIAMETER ALONG HIGHWAY 562...HOWEVER A FEW OCCASIONAL STONES REACHED 2.5 TO 3 INCHES IN DIAMETER. (ABQ)
NICKEL SIZED AND SLIGHTLY LARGER HAIL REPORTED BY TO
